# [Barriers: Inertia and systemic/institutional]{#inertia}


## Social norms

Social norms promote giving to traditional non-EA causes and fundraisers, and responding to peer requests. --> crowding out?Norms may also suggest giving to causes like AMF is "weird".


\

**Asks** (Own category?)

Donation requests increase the propensity to give (Yoruk). There is a conventional wisdom that ""most donations occur in response to an ask"".  If there are systematic asks for non-EA causes this may crowd out EG.
